name: Training Dummy
description: A sturdy wooden training dummy wrapped in thick leather padding. It's built to withstand countless attacks and is perfect for testing combat techniques. Despite being an inanimate object, it somehow seems to fight back when attacked, making it an excellent training partner.

attacks.name: Light Tap
attacks.description: The training dummy gently taps back with minimal force.

attacks.name: Soft Counter
attacks.description: The dummy's arm swings back in a controlled, light counter-attack.

attacks.name: Practice Strike
attacks.description: The training dummy responds with a measured practice strike.
